mapper.sql: id, car_id, model_type, down_amount, total_amount, period_num, period_start_date, period_end_date, final_amount, management_fee, deadline, comment, create_time, update_time
mapper.select: select FROM maple_co_model WHERE car_id = #{carId} and period_start_date < now() and now() < period_end_date
mapper.insert: insert into maple_co_model (id, car_id, model_type, down_amount, total_amount, period_num, period_start_date, period_end_date, final_amount, management_fee, deadline, comment, create_time, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{carId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{modelType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{downAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{totalAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{periodNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{periodStartDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{periodEndDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{finalAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{managementFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{deadline,jdbcType=DATE}, #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(), now())

mapper.update:
update maple_co_model
car_id = #{carId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
model_type = #{modelType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
down_amount = #{downAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
total_amount = #{totalAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
period_num = #{periodNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
period_start_date = #{periodStartDate,jdbcType=DATE},
period_end_date = #{periodEndDate,jdbcType=DATE},
final_amount = #{finalAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
management_fee = #{managementFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
deadline = #{deadline,jdbcType=DATE},
comment = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = now(),
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
